name: __MSG_name__
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; connect-src *; script-src 'self' http://localhost:* https://localhost:* https://www.google-analytics.com; style-src * blob: data: filesystem: 'unsafe-inline'; img-src *; frame-src * http://www.facebook.com https://plusone.google.com https://platform.twitter.com blob: data: filesystem:; font-src * blob: data: filesystem:; media-src *;
